tool_description: Applies trained classification models to predict categories for large batches of products efficiently.

model_id.description: Identifier of the trained classification model to use

product_batch.description: Array of product identifiers to classify

return_probabilities.description: Whether to return prediction probabilities for all categories

batch_size.description: Processing batch size for large datasets (100-2000)

error_messages: Invalid model ID: The specified model does not exist or is not accessible
Empty product batch: At least one product must be provided for classification
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 0.95
Invalid batch size: Value must be between 100 and 2000
Classification failed: Unable to process products with the specified model
usage: Provide model_id and product_batch, optionally set confidence_threshold and processing parameters. The tool returns category predictions for all products.

high_confidence.description: Number of predictions above confidence threshold

low_confidence.description: Number of predictions below confidence threshold

predicted_categories.description: Array of predicted category names for each product
